metadata.title: CVE-2008-5150 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description: sample.sh in maildirsync 1.1 allows local users to append data to arbitraryfiles via a symlink attack on a /tmp/maildirsync-*.#####.log temporaryfile.

criterions.comment: maildirsync package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
